title: PolylineDashMaterial
description: A material that fills the surface of a line with a pattern of dashes.

color.description: The color of the dashes on the line.

gapColor.description: The color of the gaps between dashes on the line.  The default is transparent.

dashLength.description: The length in screen-space pixels of a single dash and gap pattern.

dashPattern.description: A 16-bit bitfield representing which portions along a single dashLength are the dash (1) and which are the gap (0).  The default value, 255 (0000000011111111), indicates 50% gap followed by 50% dash.
